bug.author: jorgemf
bug.summary: Error while uploading projects with big files
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
I have a project with jupyter notebooks, which are around 1.5Mb. Polyaxon fails when uploading this files with an error: 413 Request Entity Too Large <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Create a project with a big file as a jupyter notebook. Try to upload the code. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
The jupyter notebook should be uploaded as code. It might be more interesting throw a warning and asking you if you are sure of uploading a big file instead of failing. I like the fact it tells me that I am uploading something big and it might be wrond doing it, but at the same time it limits what you can do with notebooks. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Feel free to reopen if you still have the same issue after upgrading to 0.2.7
